sources.name: PovcalNet (2018)
sources.dataPublishedBy: PovcalNet: the online tool for poverty measurement developed by the Development Research Group of the World Bank

fields.name: Bottom decile income/consumption per day
fields.description: Average income or consumption per day of the bottom decile.

fields.name: Difference between top and bottom decile income/consumption per day
fields.description: The absolute difference between the top and bottom decile's average income/consumption per day.

owidDisplaySettings.name: Difference between top and bottom decile income/consumption per day

fields.name: World Bank region (including Advanced Industrialized category)
fields.description: Region as defined by World Bank, including Advanced Industrialized country category taken from 'Poverty and Shared Prosperity: Taking on Inequality' World Bank (2016).
